questions.text: I got my haircut today and they did it way too short.
The dog chased the cat around the block four times.
The clock was ticking and kept me awake all night.
The alligator's teeth were so scary that I ran back to the car as fast as I could.
How did you know that I was going to have a peanut butter sandwich for lunch?
I read the news to get relevant facts and updates.
There are three hundred and thirty three trees in the forest.
I always make sure to pay the bills on time.
Too much information can be too hard to understand.
Mississippi is really far from Massachusetts.
The taxes are getting way too high these days.
Idaho is a state known for a lot of potatoes.
Did you know that Kansas City is within the state of Missouri?
There were sixty-three text messages from an old friend of mine.
There are three things that I think that needs more thought.
